dcterms:creator: Tianxiao Shen
Tao Lei
Regina Barzilay
Tommi Jaakkola
dcterms:description: The Yelp dataset consists of restaurant reviews, each of which does not exceed 16 words. Reviews are labeled as either positive or negative.
dcterms:title: Yelp reviews

dcterms:creator: Xiang Zhang
Junbo Zhao
Yann LeCun
dcterms:description: The Amazon review polarity dataset consists of customer reviews about different products with ratings ranging from 1 star to 5 stars; reviews with ≤ 2 stars are defined as negative and those with ≥ 4 stars as positive.
dcterms:title: Amazon reviews polarity
